message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a limited-time offer, and I believe it presents an excellent value considering its worth of $10,000 to you. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're offering, my budget for this product is closer to $10,000. I'm willing to offer $10,500, which is a fair price considering the value it holds for me. Let me know if you're willing to consider this offer.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I am unable to accept your offer of $10,500. However, I am willing to negotiate further. How about we meet halfway at $11,000? This still allows you to acquire the product at a premium value while accommodating your budget constraints.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,750, which is a fair compromise considering the value I'm getting from this product. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're willing to accept.

After reviewing your latest offer, Bob, I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to come down to $10,900 for the product. This still represents a premium value for you while being within a reasonable range for both of us. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs.
